title: place
description: A negative or positive offset from Mean Sea Level (6,371.0088km from Earths core).

names.description: An array of alternative place names.

parent.description: A parent place, possibly from reverse geocoding.

desc.description: A long form description of the place.

loc.description: The geo-political location string for the node.

address.description: The street/mailing address for the place.

geojson.description: A GeoJSON representation of the place.

latlong.description: The lat/long position for the place.

bbox.description: A bounding box which encompases the place.

radius.description: An approximate radius to use for bounding box calculation.

photo.description: The image file to use as the primary image of the place.
